text: The Fort Stevenson State Park Arboretum is a new arboretum located near the campground at Fort Stevenson State Park [] on the north shore of Lake Sakakawea approximately 3 miles (5 km) south of Garrison, North Dakota. The arboretum contains over 50 native and non-native trees, shrubs, wildflowers and grasses, including Eleagnus angustifolia, Juniperus scopulorum, Salix exigua, and Ulmus pumila. ==See also== *List of botanical gardens in the United States ==External links== * * Category:Arboreta in North Dakota Category:Protected areas of McLean County, North Dakota
title: Fort Stevenson State Park Arboretum
